channel.title: Focal on Erin's Audio Corner
channel.description: Recent content in Focal on Erin's Audio Corner

item.title: Focal 1000 IWLCR6 In-Wall Speaker Review
item.description:
Foreword / YouTube Video Review

This speaker was sent to me by the owner directly from the retailer and received brand new in box. The speaker received countless hours’ worth of playtime using broadband stimulus to alleviate any concerns of “break in”.

item.title: Focal Twin6 Be Studio Monitor Review
item.description:
Foreword / YouTube Video Review

The review on this website is a brief overview and summary of the objective performance of this speaker. It is not intended to be a deep dive. Moreso, this is information for those who prefer “just the facts” and prefer to have the data without the filler.
